name: Mecha Melia
description:
Objective

Score as many points as you can by blasting mechanical aliens out of the sky

Gamepad controls (One or two can be used)

  • D-Pad - Left and Right
  • A - Shoot Up
  • X - Shoot Across
  • Start - Confirm & Restart 
  • Select - Menu

Please note that if your gamepad is not working, try plugging it into another USB port because your computer may have already configured player 1 and player 2 into a specific USB slot.

Controls for Green Player (Keyboard)

  • A & D - Move Left and Right
  • W - Shoot up
  • S - Shoot Across
  • Space, Enter or Left Mouse Button - Confirm

Controls for Blue Player (Keyboard)

  • Left and Right Arrows - Move Left and Right
  • Up Arrow - Shoot up
  • Down Arrow - Shoot Across
  • Space, Enter or Left Mouse Button - Confirm

Keyboard shortcuts

  • F - Fullscreen
  • M - Menu
  • R - Restart

Development Details

This game was made using Construct 3 and it was made for GDKO 2023 - Round 4. The task is to recreate the classic arcade game Centipede in your own style.
